mil7.6.4:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil7.6.4:0.2_0: The account of the fault-finding mind
mil7.6.4:1.1_0: “Having taken the dried up, thearred and the music of a five reasons?”
mil7.6.4:1.2_0: “Great king, suppose there was no conception of identity that emerge from the controlling of the throat, middle, or junior,
mil7.6.4:1.3_0: In the same way, a woman or a man who goes to a family with another family.
mil7.6.4:1.4_0: Being in a house, this is one pervaded.
mil7.6.4:1.5_0: When the Buddha has spoken, the gods of the Cūḷapanthaka
mil7.6.4:2.2_0: the food and drink that she consumes—
mil7.6.4:2.4_0: nor will they make a choice.’”
mil7.6.4:3.1_0: The fourth part of the house’s imminent.
